name: TT Media Limited
description: Provider of a live video streaming platform intended to provide digital concierge service. The company's live video streaming platform includes a community forum for sharing emotion and insights, enabling users to share their experiences and talents via live video from mobile and desktop platforms.
one_liner: Provider of a live video streaming platform intended to provide digital concierge service. The company's live video streaming platform includes a community forum for sharing emotion and insights, enabling users to share their experiences and talents via live video from mobile and desktop platforms.
